about.summary: Similarity Network Fusion takes multiple views of a network and fuses them together to construct an overall status matrix. The input to our algorithm can be feature vectors, pairwise distances, or pairwise similarities. The learned status matrix can then be used for retrieval, clustering, and classification.

name: r-snftool
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.3.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-snftool
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/SNFtool_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/SNFtool/SNFtool_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6cb5102b8e89523445060d392611c2672becfadd51a09cc2df1acae32b67f4fa

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-exposition
    - r-alluvial
    - r-heatmap.plus
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-exposition
    - r-alluvial
    - r-heatmap.plus

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('SNFtool')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('SNFtool')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=SNFtool
  license: GPL
  summary: Similarity Network Fusion takes multiple views of a network and fuses them together
    to construct an overall status matrix. The input to our algorithm can be feature
    vectors, pairwise distances, or pairwise similarities. The learned status matrix
    can then be used for retrieval, clustering, and classification.
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: SNFtool
# Type: Package
# Title: Similarity Network Fusion
# Version: 2.3.0
# Date: 2018-04-24
# Author: Bo Wang, Aziz Mezlini, Feyyaz Demir, Marc Fiume, Zhuowen Tu, Michael Brudno, Benjamin Haibe-Kains, Anna Goldenberg
# Maintainer: Daniel Cole <goldenberglab@gmail.com>
# Imports: heatmap.plus, ExPosition, alluvial
# Description: Similarity Network Fusion takes multiple views of a network and fuses them together to construct an overall status matrix. The input to our algorithm can be feature vectors, pairwise distances, or pairwise similarities. The learned status matrix can then be used for retrieval, clustering, and classification.
# License: GPL
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-04-24 16:23:07 UTC
# Packaged: 2018-04-24 15:59:51 UTC; danielcole
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
